description: This file defines the RoomsListPage widget, which displays a list of hotel rooms, allows users to refresh the list, handle errors, and navigate to booking or other pages.

classes.name: RoomsListPage
classes.description: Main widget representing the rooms listing page.

classes.name: _RoomsListPageState
classes.description: State class managing data fetching, UI state, and user interactions for RoomsListPage.

classes.name: _ErrorView
classes.description: Stateless widget displaying error messages with retry option.

classes.name: _EmptyView
classes.description: Stateless widget displaying message when no rooms are available with refresh option.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes state and fetches the list of rooms.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the rooms list page, handling different states such as loading, error, empty, or displaying rooms.

methods.name: onRetry
methods.description: Triggers re-fetching the room list upon user retry.

methods.name: onRefresh
methods.description: Triggers refresh of the room list, typically when user pulls to refresh.
